content.title: 6. Extensible
content.author: Didier Fanchon
content.subtitle: Extensibilit√©
content.paragraph:
The modular structure of Rubedo is based on a simple and well documented API and software components standardized and controlled by many developers around the world. Creating an extension to suit your own needs, with its data structure and presentation templates, is done in a few clicks through expert assistants. If you want to go further, you'll need to master PHP!
